abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column remembers West Point alumnus Bill Zadel, who died at age 68; holds that Zadel took an epic American path, from college football all-star to Marine in Vietnam to corporate executive and family man--the ideal of scholar-athlete-citizen that football, in particular, likes to display.
snippet: Bill Zadel took an epic American path, from college all-star to Marine in Vietnam to corporate executive and family man.
lead_paragraph: Bill Zadel took an epic American path, from college all-star to Marine in Vietnam to corporate executive and family man.

headline.main: A Love Story Affirmed Life in Time of War
headline.print_headline: A Love Story Affirmed Life In Time of War
headline.seo: Army Player’s Love Story Is Woven With Victories and Loss
